title: 'Type of paper- Good and size of notebook- just right'
body: When it comes to writing, specifically with fountain pens, the type of paper is important. It shouldn't blot too quickly and the ink shouldn't spread.  Secondly, the size should just be perfect for carrying 3-4 of these for various subjects in the back-pack.  I am happy to report 1. the paper quality is good, the ink does not blot. 2. The cover is sturdy enough to carry in backpacks 3. Not very heavy if one carries 3-4 of these along with other books  Good product and good value for money. We are satisfied.

title: 'Good for use with pencil or any light shaded ball pen.'
body: The media could not be loaded. Everything is fine except the paper quality and it's thickness The paper doesn't resist the flow of ink from a gel pen or roller ball pen whereas classmate is lot better in this. The ink bleeds most of the time with my pilot 05 and V5 pens and also with classmate Octane Only pens like linc glycer can perform good.
